name: あいるみすてぃ～く
summary: Hero became an owner of the island in the vicinity of Okinawa. There was a famous statue of dragon there. But one day it was revealed that the standing statue was a fake. Now it's needed to find the real one sold by pieced around the island.
info:
• 剧本: 穂高望
  • 原画: 神宮寺りお , あいざわ某
  • 别名: Isle Mystique
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1997/12/05
  • 售价: ￥8,800 (税込￥9,680)
  • 开发: アズロクス
  • 音乐: Golden”玉龍”
